entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.

entry.title: Wednesday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 56 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 37.
